item.description:
Welcome-Introductions Gathering--

Mission- Find a monogamous, long term-life time partner or marriage!

Date and Time: Decided by Host

Dec. 1- Sat. 6:00PM-11:00PM

Format:
Location is in a warm, relaxing environment of a home.

Admission: $5.00
If your name begins with the following- please bring: Will change monthly:

A-G- Entree and soft drink or water
H-P - Appetizer and bottle of wine
Q-Z - Desert and a bottle of wine

Organizer and Host Home
Organizer Richard Tosti
Host Home- Rose Di Bartolo

Host decides: Quotes from our Host-Rose
1. Time of party: 6:00PM -11:00pm
2. Dress code- "wear what is comfortable.?
3. "You can enjoy the music and dance if you like"
4. "Keep your shoes on if you like"
5. "Everyone can play pool or checkers"

Purpose is to Socialize with similar people of our age who are searching for a lifetime partner.
45-65 age group.

I began these parties in my home in July 2006-twice a month

Our common Values: Common denominator
Have fun meeting old and new friends
Circulate, talk to everyone.
If someone is alone go up to them and say hi!
Nonsmokers
Please be Friendly, Positive, and optimistic to everyone.

You are coming because you got this email, this is your invitation. Please invite other friends, Particularly men.

It is not necessary to inform me that we have more woman. I know.
that fact. Women are more gregarious and open-minded than many men.

We all need to exert an effort to invite men.
This group was formed on the principle of synergy. Working together to invite quality people. It is our job to take responsibility for inviting people.

You can sign up on http://dance.meetup.c...
You do not need to email me personally.
100 guests only.

You know the time, the location , what you should bring. Let's have fun!

Location and Directions
40 Pleasant St
Dover, MA
508-785-3434
From North of Newton:
Exit 22 - Route 16W
Travel approx 5.5 miles on Route 16 west (it takes a sharp left turn just before Wellesley Center ? watch the signs). Take a Left at the set of lights onto Pleasant Street (you will see the following landmarks: Charles River Waterfall, Bacon Free Library, White Eliot Church)
Follow Pleasant Street for ONE MILE- passing along the way LOOKOUT FARM ? Be sure you go past the Farm. Once you see Pegan Lane my house will be the next on your Right. PLEASE NOTE: The numbers on Pleasant St prior to Lookout Farm are in Natick, Pegan Lane is the first street in Dover. I'll put balloons on the mailbox.
From Route 128 North (From Southshore)
Exit 16B ? Route 109 Westwood. Take 1st Street on RIGHT ? GROVE STREET and follow to end (you will drive between two golf courses). At end (Dedham Street) take a left and travel 2.2 miles. Take a RIGHT onto HAVEN ST. and follow to the end (it is a twisting road that makes a sharp right turn near Church St but just keep on Haven) At the Second Stop Sign take a right onto Main. Keep to the left where Main St will become Pleasant. We are #40 on the left. A white house with Green Shutters.
Rose has a 5000 Square foot home- 3 car garage- two 3 feet high stone pillars in the entrance. Look for balloons on the mailbox. My red Town and Country Van will be parked in front of house.

Park on the right side of street. Enter the house on the garage side.

Rose and I look forward to seeing you on Oct. 27th. 100 guests only

The best is yet to be!

Richard Tosti
item.name: Introduction Gatherings - Singles Party Meetup
